name: music-madness-sync-bridge
description: FoundryVTT <-> Notion Story Bible sync bridge with MCP tools

scripts.sync:preview: npm run build --silent && node dist/src/cli.js sync preview
scripts.sync:apply: npm run build --silent && node dist/src/cli.js sync apply
scripts.sync:conflicts: npm run build --silent && node dist/src/cli.js sync conflicts
scripts.sync:resolve: npm run build --silent && node dist/src/cli.js sync resolve
scripts.test: npm run build --silent && node dist/tests/smoke.js && node dist/tests/proxy-lifecycle.js
scripts.health:remote: npm run build --silent && node dist/src/cli.js health:remote
scripts.doctor: npm run build --silent && node dist/src/cli.js doctor
